languages.name: Dwarvish
languages.description: Dwarvish is full of hard consonants and guttural sounds.

languages.name: Elvish
languages.description: Elvish is fluid, with subtle intonations and intricate grammar. Elven literature is rich and varied, and their songs and poems are famous among other races. Many bards learn their language so they can add Elvish ballads to their repertoires.

languages.name: Gnomish
languages.description: The Gnomish language, which uses the Dwarvish script, is renowned for its technical treatises and its catalogs of knowledge about the natural world.

languages.name: Halfling
languages.description: The Halfling language isn't secret, but halflings are loath to share it with others. They write very little, so they don't have a rich body of literature. Their oral tradition, however, is very strong.

languages.name: Orc
languages.description: Orc is a harsh, grating language with hard consonants. It has no script of its own but is written in the Dwarvish script.

languages.name: Draconic
languages.description: Draconic is thought to be one of the oldest languages and is often used in the study of magic. The language sounds harsh to most other creatures and includes numerous hard consonants and sibilants.

languages.name: Unknown
languages.description: Language unknown or not applicable.

languages.name: Any One Language (Usually Common)
languages.description: Can speak any one language, typically Common.

languages.name: Any One Language
languages.description: Can speak any one language.

languages.name: Any Two Languages
languages.description: Can speak any two languages.

languages.name: Any Four Languages
languages.description: Can speak any four languages.

languages.name: Any Six Languages
languages.description: Can speak any six languages.

languages.name: All Languages
languages.description: Can speak and understand all languages.

languages.name: Blink Dog
languages.description: The language of blink dogs.

languages.name: Giant Eagle
languages.description: The language of giant eagles.

languages.name: Giant Elk
languages.description: The language of giant elk.

languages.description: The language of giant owls.

languages.name: Sahuagin
languages.description: The language of sahuagin.

languages.name: Sphinx
languages.description: The language of sphinxes.

languages.name: Winter Wolf
languages.description: The language of winter wolves.

languages.name: Worg
languages.description: The language of worgs.

languages.name: Otyugh
languages.description: The language of otyughs.

languages.name: Druidic
languages.description: The secret language of druids.

languages.description: Can understand the languages known by its creator but lacks the ability to speak.

languages.name: Understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

languages.description: Retains understanding of languages from life but cannot speak.

languages.description: Can speak Common but not while in boar form.
